mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_gallery_board gb LEFT JOIN tb_admin a on a.admin_id = gb.author_id and gb.author_type = 'admin' LEFT JOIN tb_member m on m.member_id = gb.author_id and gb.author_type = 'member'

SELECT gb.*, ctg.category_name, f.file_path, f.physical_name, f.extension, a.admin_name, m.member_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_file WHERE board_type='gallery' AND board_id = gb.board_id) AS fileCount FROM tb_gallery_board gb LEFT JOIN tb_category ctg on gb.category_id = ctg.category_id LEFT JOIN tb_admin a on a.admin_id = gb.author_id and gb.author_type = 'admin' LEFT JOIN tb_member m on m.member_id = gb.author_id and gb.author_type = 'member' LEFT JOIN tb_file f on f.board_id = gb.board_id AND f.board_type = 'gallery'
GROUP BY gb.board_id ORDER BY
gb.created_at
gb.category_id
gb.title
gb.views

LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_gallery_board (category_id, author_type, author_id, title, content) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{authorType}, #{authorId}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_gallery_board SET content = '삭제된 게시물입니다.', deleted = 1, edited_at = current_timestamp WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
UPDATE tb_gallery_board SET views = views + 1 WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
